tweet_text:
@SpeechlessRage @JohnnyNovio @larryfd @JanNWolfe I disagree. The weekend shows have a far reach, beyond the “political nerds”
Especially those Sunday network shows, which reach into homes that ignore news throughout the week. They can be as damaging as Facebook is on the daily but on one quick dose.
